__notes__: This config point to precompiled binaries, most of which for 64bit platforms. Consider overriding this in your config.
mkbootimg and unpackimg are required if you have boot.make = true, or recovery.make = true
heimdall is required if you are going to use 'incept plant' command for samsung devices
make_ext4fs is required if you have cache.make = true
adb is required if you use 'incept learn' command
java and signapk are required if you have update.sign = true
apktool is required if you are patching apks
update-binary depends on target device architecture
update package will be signed by default android test keys, unless you override update.keys in your config
